extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Software and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the installed software versions are affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Software to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update PuTTY, FileZilla, WinSCP, TortoiseGit, and TortoiseSVN to the latest fixed versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Replace NIST P-521 Keys
extracted_playbook.description: Review and replace any NIST P-521 (521-bit ECDSA, ecdsa-sha2-nistp521) keys used with affected versions of PuTTY, as they should be considered compromised.

cve_id: Vulnerability in PuTTY, FileZilla, WinSCP, TortoiseGit, TortoiseSVN
